committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Declaring May 19 a national holiday and day of prayer and remembrance honoring Malcolm X (Al Hajj Malik Al-Shabazz).

summary.text: Designates May 19 as a national holiday (Malcolm X Day) to be commemorated as a day of prayer, remembrance, and reflection on the life of Malcolm X.

titles.title: Declaring May 19 a national holiday and day of prayer and remembrance honoring Malcolm X (Al Hajj Malik Al-Shabazz).
